text: unase pahale jo log guzare hai, ve bhee chaalen chal chuke hai, kintu vaastavik chaal to pooree kee pooree allaah hee ke haath mein hai. pratyek vyakti jo kamaee kar raha hai use vah jaanata hai. inakaar karanevaalon ko sheeghr hee gyaat ho jaega ki paralok-grh ke shubh parinaam ke adhikaaree kaun hai
